# hubUtils <a href="https://infectious-disease-modeling-hubs.github.io/hubUtils/"><img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="131" alt="hubUtils website" /></a>

The goal of `hubUtils` is to provide a set of utility functions for downloading, plotting, and scoring forecast and truth data from Infectious Disease Modeling Hubs

## Installation

You can install the development version of `hubUtils` like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("Infectious-Disease-Modeling-Hubs/hubUtils")
```

> #####  **Note:**
> If you have any problems with installation of package `V8` (more likely on Linux), please consult the [following installation instructions](https://github.com/jeroen/V8#installation).

***
